cause.description:
The Oregon League of Conservation Voters is the independent political voice for Oregon's environment. For 35 years, we've worked to educate voters about how their elected officials vote on environmental issues, lobbied on behalf of the environmental community's priorities, and worked to elect pro-environment leaders.
1. Elected officials should be held accountable for their voting record on environmental issues
cause.mission: Educating the public about how their elected officials vote on environmental issues and holding those elected officials accountable.
cause.name: Oregon League of Conservation Voters
